translations: n．单簧管演奏家：擅长演奏单簧管的音乐家。
· The orchestra has several talented clarinetists.
这个管弦乐队有几位才华横溢的单簧管演奏家。

sentences.sentence: And the best way to learn to play jazz is to listen to jazz recordings of all the jazz clarinetists you can find. Simply copy their playing and their particular stylistic ideas.
sentences.translation: 学习爵士最简单的办法是尽可能多听爵士单簧管演奏家的录音，学习他们的演奏方式和演奏风格。
